function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor hand hygiene","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of quarantine facilities and sanitation policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental contexts having a weaker influence on visiting green areas than socioeconomic attributes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-emergence of the disease due to the completion of the three gorges dam","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher cost and massive power consumption of sensor nodes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of prevention measures for virus propagation in residential buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap of residential and office real estate sectors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited efficiency of conventional t8 fluorescent tubes in uv-c range","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread from animals to humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discussion of the potential of quarantine measures, hospital isolation measures, and self-protection measures to alleviate the spread of the epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quick and early detection of the disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in source code for surveillance applications","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear disinfection methodology for built environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in public housing accelerating the spread of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition of the important role of individual choice and actions in delivering socially desired transport outcomes in a post-covid world","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited open government data projects focused on disaster management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to establish cause and effect relationships due to cross-sectional design","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical contact with actuator technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alarms are generated when nodes are not working properly, indicating a risk of delayed identification and resolution of node malfunctions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient user uptake, navigation issues","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of government support for the construction sector during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public support for action on climate change at all-time high prior to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased time spent in the bedroom not sleeping, but engaging in activities like watching movies or using social media, which can be problematic for resident well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring and disinfection of liquid waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multi-sectoral collaboration","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of being exposed to the virus at work","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic instability, decreased conservation efforts, and plummeting economy due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cognitive trust through untact channels and strong relationships in banking services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pooling of social harms within homes may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases and prolonged intensity of harm","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of higher covid-19 infection risk due to proximity to out-group members and unfamiliar environments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Staggering scale of healthcare waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of universal design in residential structures for whole-of-life-stage use","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunities for older adults to exercise have been greatly impacted due to covid-19 lockdown measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in teleworking during the pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey focused on new york metropolitan area, limiting generalizability to other regions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral titre measurement and assay procedure may pose a risk of exposure to lab personnel","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate communication","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on global suppliers leading to shortages of essential goods and equipment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Meta-analysis based on ’high’ and ’low’ greenspace exposure defined by individual papers’ highest and lowest categories, which may result in inconsistent categorization and interpretation of exposure levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for rapid and radical changes in public space usage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact among gardeners may lead to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
